name: Tomb: A Level Design Experiment
description:
An experiment with the basic rules of level design

3D puzzle first-person shooter inspired by 90s shooter level design where the player needs to find all keys to get to the final area.

This was developed as a university project, so apologies for any inconsistencies and possible bugs.

Features:

  • Level Design
  • Action
  • Puzzle Solving

Team credits:

Octávio Silva (Game Developer)
